alert.note: Alert for Centre; Clearfield (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 10:19AM EDT until May 16 at 11:15AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Centre County in central Pennsylvania... Eastern Clearfield County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 1115 AM EDT. * At 1018 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chester Hill, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Philipsburg, Woodland, Osceola Mills, Chester Hill, Karthaus, Snow Shoe, North Philipsburg, Clarence, South Philipsburg, Sandy Ridge, Moshannon and Pine Glen. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Clearfield and Milesburg exits, specifically from mile markers 120 to 153. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
